title: THE MEKHANE
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

> So, I've been really into the Mekhanite stuff recently, and drew this image inspired by it :) I'm not sure how it will go down, but basically, this is how someone with extreme synesthesia sees the Church of the Broken God. Basically, neurospicy Cogworks.  Enjoy!!! <3 

[[image https://lounge.hexick.com/uploads/9e5606ab8483d6cc/image.png ]]
author: Dr Vikki Lost
